command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3T1zJ51LUnRwksr.root --database PRLTv39ySLt5ijTYKqCuQo --execute 
-- First, insert Tempe Town Lake location if it doesn't exist
INSERT INTO locations (name, address, city, state, zip_code, region, created_at, updated_at)
SELECT 'Tempe Town Lake Marina', '550 E Tempe Town Lake, Tempe, AZ 85288', 'Tempe', 'AZ', '85288', 'Phoenix Area', NOW(), NOW()
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM locations WHERE name = 'Tempe Town Lake Marina');

-- Get the location ID
SELECT id FROM locations WHERE name = 'Tempe Town Lake Marina';
logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 3: Unknown column 'zip_code' in 'field list'
